thread.title: 3 Puppies Rescued From Deadly Italian Avalanche
thread.title_full: 3 Puppies Rescued From Deadly Italian Avalanche

author: Hedy Phillips
title: 3 Puppies Rescued From Deadly Italian Avalanche
text:
Puppies Rescued From Avalanche in Italy 3 Puppies Rescued From Deadly Italian Avalanche January 23, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 
Image Source: Facebook user Hotel Rigopiano 
Last week, an avalanche rocked Farindola, Italy. After a series of earthquakes triggered the avalanche , the Hotel Rigopiano was buried under snow, and three puppies — and many hotel guests and employees — were left stranded. But on Monday, rescue crews found the Sheepdog puppies in an air pocket in the hotel's boiler room. Watch the rescue story in the video below, and scroll through for photos of the joyous occasion.
